value.title: 3+ approaches for Dynamic Axis in Power BI

Patrick's Dynamic Axis video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=n-OWNaCUU0o  Kasper's Blog: https://www.kasperonbi.com/dynamically-switching-axis-on-visuals-with-power-bi/

value.title: 3 ways to REDUCE DATA In Power BI Desktop (No Premium needed!)
value.excerpt: Sometimes you want to reduce data in Power BI Desktop so it's easier to work with. Then work with all the data in the Power BI Service. Patrick shows you 3 ways that can help do this without using Incremental Refresh or needing Power BI Premium!  📢 Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership

value.title: Can you refresh a single table in Power BI?
value.excerpt: Frustrated that a you can only do a full refresh? Patrick takes it to the next level by showing how you can refresh only a single table in your Power BI dataset. This is a great option for targeted refresh and avoid potential overhead. value.title: Dynamically change chart axis in Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick builds on a blog post from Scott Senkeresty to dynamically change the axis of your visual within Power BI. This uses a combination of Power Query and DAX.
